phase_title: Project Initialization, Design System and Authentication
phase_description: Bootstrap the entire Vite + React project with all tooling, establish the complete design system including theme tokens, fonts, color palette, dark/light mode infrastructure, and build the Login page as the entry point.

rules.label: font-family: Lexend; font-weight: 500
rules.table_header: font-family: Roboto; font-weight: 600; text-transform: uppercase; letter-spacing: 0.05em; font-size: 0.75rem
rules.caption: font-family: Roboto; font-weight: 300

logo_spec.description: SVG React component. The logo is text-based: 'Ai-TS' where 'Ai' is in white/black (depending on mode), '-' is in primary #BE052E, and 'TS' is in primary #BE052E. Below it in very small Montserrat font: 'Airport Intelligent Trolley System'. There is a small abstract icon to the left: a minimalist trolley/cart silhouette with a radio signal arc above it, all in #BE052E. Logo has two variants: 'full' (icon + text) and 'icon' (icon only for collapsed sidebar). Export both as named exports: LogoFull and LogoIcon.
logo_spec.usage: Used in LoginPage header, Sidebar top, and wherever branding is needed

tailwind_config_instructions.extend_colors: Add all brand colors under 'brand', 'surface' (with dark/light variants via CSS variables), 'status' keys
tailwind_config_instructions.extend_fontFamily: Add 'lexend', 'montserrat', 'poppins', 'roboto' mapped to respective Google Font families
tailwind_config_instructions.darkMode: Set to 'class' so dark mode is toggled via class on html element

css_variables.description: In src/index.css define CSS custom properties for both :root (light) and .dark (dark) selectors. These drive shadcn/ui component theming.

theme_provider.description: React context that manages 'light' | 'dark' theme state. Persists to localStorage under key 'aits-theme'. Applies the class 'dark' to document.documentElement when dark mode is active. Exposes: theme, setTheme, toggleTheme.
theme_provider.hook: src/hooks/useTheme.ts - convenience hook that calls useContext(ThemeContext)

auth_provider.description: React context managing authentication state. For Phase 1 use mock data. Stores user object in localStorage under 'aits-user'. Exposes: user, login(email, password), logout(), isAuthenticated, isLoading. Mock user has roles: 'super_admin' | 'terminal_admin' | 'operator' | 'viewer'. Mock credentials: admin@aits.io / Admin@123.

login_page.layout: Full viewport centered layout. Background: dark mode shows deep black (#0A0A0A) with a subtle radial gradient using primary color (#BE052E) emanating from top-right corner at ~15% opacity. Light mode shows off-white (#F8F8F8) with very faint same gradient. No background image.
login_page.left_panel: On screens >= 1024px show a left panel (50% width) with: airport terminal silhouette illustration in SVG (minimalist line art style, single color using primary #BE052E at 20% opacity as fill), large Montserrat heading 'Manage Smarter. Move Faster.', subheading in Poppins about the Ai-TS system, and three feature bullet icons (Trolley Tracking, Real-time Analytics, Terminal Intelligence).
login_page.right_panel: Login card (max-w-md, centered). Card has slight border, subtle shadow. Contents: LogoFull component at top. H2 heading 'Welcome Back' in Montserrat. Subtext 'Sign in to your Ai-TS dashboard' in Lexend. Form fields: Email (with mail icon), Password (with lock icon + eye toggle). Remember me checkbox. 'Forgot password?' link (non-functional, just UI). Primary submit button full width: 'Sign In' with loading spinner state. Error message area below form for invalid credentials. Footer text: 'Ai-TS Admin v1.0 - Secured Access Only'.
login_page.form_validation: Use react-hook-form + zod. Email: valid email format. Password: min 6 chars. Show inline field errors.
login_page.on_success: Navigate to /dashboard. Use framer-motion fade+slide transition.
login_page.animations: Card entrance: fade in from bottom (y: 20 -> 0, opacity: 0 -> 1, duration 0.4s). Button hover: scale 1.02. Input focus: border color transitions to primary.
login_page.theme_toggle: Small theme toggle button (sun/moon icon) in top-right corner of the page
login_page.language_switcher: Small language dropdown (EN/AR/FR) top-right near theme toggle

routing_setup.description: Use createBrowserRouter from react-router-dom v6. Define routes: '/' redirects to '/login', '/login' renders LoginPage, '/dashboard/*' renders the main layout (built in Phase 2) wrapped in ProtectedRoute.

protected_route.description: Checks isAuthenticated from useAuth. If false, redirects to /login with the intended path saved in location state for redirect after login. Shows skeleton loader while isLoading is true.

i18n_setup.description: Initialize i18next in src/lib/i18n.ts. Support languages: en (English), ar (Arabic - RTL), fr (French). Store locale in localStorage 'aits-language'. Create translation files: src/locales/en.json, src/locales/ar.json, src/locales/fr.json. For Phase 1 only translate Login page strings. Use LanguageDetector plugin.
i18n_setup.rtl_support: When language is 'ar', add dir='rtl' attribute to document.documentElement

file_instructions.src/lib/constants.ts: Export APP_NAME='Ai-TS', APP_FULL_NAME='Airport Intelligent Trolley System', APP_VERSION='1.0.0', STORAGE_KEYS object, ROUTES object with all path constants, ROLES array, DEFAULT_LANGUAGE='en'
file_instructions.src/lib/utils.ts: Export cn() utility using clsx + tailwind-merge. Export formatDate(), formatNumber(), truncate(), generateId(), getRoleColor(), getStatusColor() helper functions.
file_instructions.src/types/index.ts: Re-export all types. Define shared types: ApiResponse<T>, PaginatedResponse<T>, SelectOption, TableColumn<T>, DateRange, Coordinates.
file_instructions.src/types/auth.types.ts: Define: User, AuthState, LoginCredentials, Permission, Role types.

quality_checklist: Tailwind classes only from config (no arbitrary values for brand colors - use CSS variables)
Dark mode toggle works on Login page
Mock login works with admin@aits.io / Admin@123
Redirect to /dashboard after login (dashboard will 404 until Phase 2)
Framer-motion animations on page load and form interactions
